name: Doug's Moai Adventure
description:
Doug's Moai Adventure is based on the Jenni webcomic and the Doug the Ogre Collaborative Comic (Anyone can participate in the Doug the Ogre Collaborative Comic, as it's licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Sharealike 4.0 license).

Doug's Moai Adventure, Doug the Ogre and Merlin (Jenni Comic Version) are licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license.

The adventure engine is Copyright © 2012 Sandy Maguire. The sourcecode for Doug's Moai Adventure (minus the story, art, sound, and music) is covered under the adventure engine license (see the ENGINE LICENSE file in the zip archive).

Feel free to share this game, but please keep all documentation in tact. Thank you for playing. :)

Controls
========
Hold down the left mouse button to bring up a verb coin.
Click the left mouse button to toggle the inventory menu.

Known Issues
============
Doug sometimes teleports to objects instead of walking to them.
Some of the hotspots are a bit off.

===============================================
Doug's Moai Adventure is dedicated to memory of my father (1946-2000).
